segments.text: I want to buy a black suit .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainty.Do you want double breasted suit or single breasted suit ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What about this one ? It's a very nice 3 - piece suit .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That looks great . Do you have ties here ?
segments.speaker: S1
